# Edward F Johnson Airport

Edward F Johnson Airport  is a privately owned, public use airport  south of the central business district of Ishpeming, a city in Marquette County, Michigan, United States.
Facilities and aircraft
Edward F Johnson Airport covers an area of  and contains one runway designated 18/36 with a 2,200 x 100 ft (671 x 30 m) turf surface. For the 12-month period ending December 31, 2017, the airport had 825 aircraft operations, an average of 69 per month: 100% general aviation. In November 2021, there were 4 aircraft based at this airport, all single-engine airplanes.
The airport does not have a fixed-base operator, and no fuel is available.
